Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 45 Filed 08/20/20 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
---------------------------------------------------------------X

UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

Notice of Appearance

- v. -

20 Cr. 330 (AJN)

GHISLAINE MAXWELL,

Defendant.

---------------------------------------------------------------X

TO: Clerk of Court
United States District Court
Southern District of New York

The undersigned attorney respectfully requests the Clerk to note her appearance in this case and to add her as a Filing User to whom Notices of Electronic Filing will be transmitted in this case.

Respectfully submitted,

AUDREY STRAUSS
Acting United States Attorney for the
Southern District of New York

by: s/
Lara Pomerantz
Assistant United States Attorney
(212) 637-2343

DOJ-OGR-00001731

additional_notes: The document is a Notice of Appearance filed by Lara Pomerantz, Assistant United States Attorney, in the case United States of America v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is typed and contains no handwritten text or stamps.
